Well, it's only natural to side with the winner.\""},{"lineNumber":57276,"originalJapaneseLine":"　当然だな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's obvious.\""},{"lineNumber":57277,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええ話でっしゃろ！？","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Isn't that a good story!?\""},{"lineNumber":57278,"originalJapaneseLine":"　やー、カチューシャはんの言うとった通り、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yeah, just as Katusha said,"},{"lineNumber":57279,"originalJapaneseLine":"　話の分かる方で良かったですわ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm glad you're someone reasonable!\""},{"lineNumber":57280,"originalJapaneseLine":"「会わせたいってのは、魔軍か。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The one you want me to meet is from the demon army?"},{"lineNumber":57281,"originalJapaneseLine":"　じゃあ魔人だかはここに来てるのか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"Then is that demon here now?\""},{"lineNumber":57282,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ええ、ええ！　来とります。レイいう魔人ですわ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, yes! He is here. A demon named Rey.\""},{"lineNumber":57283,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ささ、こちらでっせー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Come on, right this way!\""},{"lineNumber":57284,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、まあいい。案内しろ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmm, very well. Show me the way.\""},{"lineNumber":57285,"originalJapaneseLine":"小躍りせんばかりのコンバートが案内し、","translatedEnglishLine":"Converter almost danced as he guided them,"},{"lineNumber":57286,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスたちはそのまま、歩いていった。","translatedEnglishLine":"and Rance and the others walked along."},{"lineNumber":57287,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"................\""},{"lineNumber":57288,"originalJapaneseLine":"机に脚を乗せて、魔人レイは","translatedEnglishLine":"Demon Rey rested his feet on the desk,"},{"lineNumber":57289,"originalJapaneseLine":"つまらなさそうに押し黙っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and silently looked bored."},{"lineNumber":57290,"originalJapaneseLine":"（お、おい……またご機嫌が宜しくないようだぞ……","translatedEnglishLine":"(H-Hey... He seems to be in a bad mood again..."},{"lineNumber":57291,"originalJapaneseLine":"　貴殿ら、何か知ってるか……？）","translatedEnglishLine":"Do you all know something...? )"},{"lineNumber":57292,"originalJapaneseLine":"（分かるわけがないであろう……","translatedEnglishLine":"(There's no way you could know..."},{"lineNumber":57293,"originalJapaneseLine":"　あの方は、いつもああではないか……）","translatedEnglishLine":"Isn't he always like that...? )"},{"lineNumber":57294,"originalJapaneseLine":"（いや……儂にはわかるぞい……","translatedEnglishLine":"(No... I understand..."},{"lineNumber":57295,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今日はとりわけ、ご機嫌が悪い……）","translatedEnglishLine":"Today his mood is especially bad... )"},{"lineNumber":57296,"originalJapaneseLine":"（で、ではどう宥めればいい……？）","translatedEnglishLine":"(So, how should I calm him...? )"},{"lineNumber":57297,"originalJapaneseLine":"（それは分からん）","translatedEnglishLine":"(I don't know.)"},{"lineNumber":57298,"originalJapaneseLine":"（役に立たんな貴殿……！）","translatedEnglishLine":"(You're no help...!)"},{"lineNumber":57299,"originalJapaneseLine":"同席しているのは、魔物将軍4名。","translatedEnglishLine":"Four demon generals were present at the meeting."},{"lineNumber":57300,"originalJapaneseLine":"いずれも、不機嫌そうな魔人を前にして、","translatedEnglishLine":"All of them were shrinking back before the sullen demon."},{"lineNumber":57301,"originalJapaneseLine":"縮こまっていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"They were cowering."},{"lineNumber":57302,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hmph...\""},{"lineNumber":57303,"originalJapaneseLine":"魔物将軍達のそんな態度を見ながら、","translatedEnglishLine":"Watching the demon generals' attitude,"},{"lineNumber":57304,"originalJapaneseLine":"レイは小さく鼻を鳴らす。","translatedEnglishLine":"Rey snorted quietly."},{"lineNumber":57305,"originalJapaneseLine":"（出撃を止めて来やがったかと思えば、","translatedEnglishLine":"(To think they stopped the sortie and came,"},{"lineNumber":57306,"originalJapaneseLine":"　和平だと？　くだらねェ……）","translatedEnglishLine":"and now they call it peace? Ridiculous...) "},{"lineNumber":57307,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははははは、ここか！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahaha, is it here!\""},{"lineNumber":57308,"originalJapaneseLine":"「えぇ、えぇ！　こちらです。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, yes! Right this way."},{"lineNumber":57309,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ぶひゃひゃひゃひゃ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Buhyahyahyahya!\" (laughing)"},{"lineNumber":57310,"originalJapaneseLine":"廊下から、馬鹿笑いが二重奏で聞こえてくる。","translatedEnglishLine":"From the hallway, a duet of foolish laughter echoed."},{"lineNumber":57311,"originalJapaneseLine":"どうやら、本当に来たらしい。","translatedEnglishLine":"Apparently, they really came."},{"lineNumber":57312,"originalJapaneseLine":"（……来やがった。ランスとか言ったか。","translatedEnglishLine":"(...They came. Did they say Rance?"},{"lineNumber":57313,"originalJapaneseLine":"　存外、つまらねェ野郎だ……）","translatedEnglishLine":"He's surprisingly a dull guy...) "},{"lineNumber":57314,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ごめんやっしゃー！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sorry about the wait!"},{"lineNumber":57315,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ランス総統、お連れしましたでー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Leader Rance, we've brought you here!\""},{"lineNumber":57316,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははははは、偉大なる総統、ランス様だ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahaha, the great leader, Lord Rance is here!"},{"lineNumber":57317,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ひれ伏せものども！」","translatedEnglishLine":"Bow down, you scum!\""},{"lineNumber":57318,"originalJapaneseLine":"「さあ、これで揃ったわ。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Now that we're all here,"},{"lineNumber":57319,"originalJapaneseLine":"　会談を始めましょう」","translatedEnglishLine":"let's begin the discussion.\""},{"lineNumber":57320,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………………………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\".....................\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふん。良く喋るぶた饅頭だな」
「ぶっ……あーいやいや。ランス閣下の為ですねん！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Pfft... ah no no. It's for the sake of Lord Rance!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍についたら、人類側の統治の責任者に
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If I join the demon army, I will be made the ruler responsible for human governance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: してくれるそうなんですわ！」
「ふーん……まあ、確かに勝つ方に付くのは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm... Well, it's only natural to side with the winner."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 当然だな」
「ええ話でっしゃろ！？
やー、カチューシャはんの言うとった通り、
話の分かる方で良かったですわ！」
「会わせたいってのは、魔軍か。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The one you want me to meet is from the demon army?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じゃあ魔人だかはここに来てるのか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then is that demon here now?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ええ、ええ！　来とります。レイいう魔人ですわ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Yes, yes! He is here. A demon named Rey."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ささ、こちらでっせー！」
「うむ、まあいい。案内しろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm, very well. Show me the way."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 小躍りせんばかりのコンバートが案内し、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Converter almost danced as he guided them,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスたちはそのまま、歩いていった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and Rance and the others walked along.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 机に脚を乗せて、魔人レイは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Demon Rey rested his feet on the desk,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: つまらなさそうに押し黙っていた。
（お、おい……またご機嫌が宜しくないようだぞ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (H-Hey... He seems to be in a bad mood again...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 貴殿ら、何か知ってるか……？）
（分かるわけがないであろう……
あの方は、いつもああではないか……）
（いや……儂にはわかるぞい……
今日はとりわけ、ご機嫌が悪い……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Today his mood is especially bad... )

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （で、ではどう宥めればいい……？）
（それは分からん）
（役に立たんな貴殿……！）
同席しているのは、魔物将軍4名。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Four demon generals were present at the meeting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: いずれも、不機嫌そうな魔人を前にして、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: All of them were shrinking back before the sullen demon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 縮こまっていた。
魔物将軍達のそんな態度を見ながら、
レイは小さく鼻を鳴らす。
（出撃を止めて来やがったかと思えば、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (To think they stopped the sortie and came,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 和平だと？　くだらねェ……）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and now they call it peace? Ridiculous...)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははははは、ここか！」
「えぇ、えぇ！　こちらです。
ぶひゃひゃひゃひゃ！」
廊下から、馬鹿笑いが二重奏で聞こえてくる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: From the hallway, a duet of foolish laughter echoed.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうやら、本当に来たらしい。
（……来やがった。ランスとか言ったか。
存外、つまらねェ野郎だ……）
「ごめんやっしゃー！
ランス総統、お連れしましたでー！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leader Rance, we've brought you here!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははははは、偉大なる総統、ランス様だ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gahahahaha, the great leader, Lord Rance is here!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ひれ伏せものども！」
「さあ、これで揃ったわ。
会談を始めましょう」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English
